medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to identify the individual business credit report document, its unique identifier, and specific message function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify the Business credit report message date.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify any other relevant references to this message such as a previously sent Business credit report message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify, at a minimum, the sender and receiver of the message and appropriate contact information.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify names of parties, in coded or clear form, and their function relevant to the message. Identification of the sender and receiver is mandatory for the Business credit report message.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide addresses of identified parties. Address information may not be necessary when the parties are identified in a coded manner.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify contact and communication numbers for each named party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to provide a contact person's name for each named party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
COM, A segment to identify the phone number, fax number, e-mail, or other communication number for the contact party.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify the entity for which the requested detailed information is provided or requested. For example, the segment group may be used to identify a broad category of information such as all payment history related to an entity, and in addition, default values for currency and language codes.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying a line item by a number which is assigned to the company being reported. A data group number may also be included.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment that provides the dates associated with the business credit report.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify the entity(ies) being reported.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment specifying the currency of the monetary amounts sent in the report. The currency can be overridden at a lower level when necessary.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment identifying the language of any text information sent in the message. This includes text in clear values of data elements and in the specific segment used for free text.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying at a broad level, the information categories and types.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free text that is related to the entity at an overall level.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: SG7-SG8-SG10-SG11-SG12-SG14-SG15-SG16-SG18- SG19-SG22 A group of segments that identify the hierarchical level and the data associated with the level.

medi:segment.name: Hierarchy information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HYN, A segment that defines a hierarchical level, and its relationship to other hierarchical levels such as its parent. The use of codes within this segment define its data relationship to previous iterations of the segment group, if any.

medi:segment.name: Information required
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IRQ, A segment specifying at a broad level the type of information requested or sent, such as company locations, facilities, names associated with companies and legal actions.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment providing the category and type of information details that supplement the broad level preceding data.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to provide percentage amounts relating to the details of the information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing the dates related to the details of the information.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide related reference numbers such as a Value Added Tax Registration number, a Business Registration number or a filing number.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to provide measurement values related to the type of information, as may be included in public filings.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to provide the currency code applicable to all subsequent monetary amounts. These amounts are related to the type of information. This segment may override, or replace (in the current segment group occurrence only), preceding higher level currency information.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide free text information where coded data is non-existent. This segment may contain legally required phrases.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to provide monetary amounts and percents related to the type of information specified above. Other necessary, detailed monetary amounts are nested within the following applicable segment group.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide a monetary amount related to the subject area.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment to identify one or more incremental relationships associated with a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to provide percentages related to the monetary amount, such as a percentage change that this monetary amount represents compared to an amount in another time period.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments containing information related to the payment manner of the entity, such as payments made in categories of promptness (e.g., prompt, slow, etc.)

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment specifying the type of payment manner.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to provide significance information either as a single or range of values.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to provide the percent of this payment manner as compared against the total payments.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to provide a rating value or score of the entity being reported upon.

medi:segment.name: Result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RSL, A segment to provide the rating value or score as determined by the credit agency.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to provide an industry code or text characteristic of the rating or score.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide descriptive text associated with the rating. A text rating or score may also be provided when codes or values do not exist.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify conditions related to information, and associated ranges of values and monetary amounts The segment group may be used for financial statement information or results obtained from credit inquiries.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment to provide information on a subject area and any conditions or action taken. This segment is used to identify a subject area such as a financial statement or an interview and the action taken therefrom.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment to provide information details related to the subject area such as type of financial statement, any relevant details and status.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to provide a value or range of values related to the subject area.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to provide attribute information related to the subject area, such as format of a financial statement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to provide monetary amounts related to stated conditions.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide a monetary amount related to the subject area.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment to identify one or more incremental relationships associated with a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to provide quantity information related to the entity. The segment group is primarily used in conjunction with other segment groups at this level that provide meaning to the quantity information.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to provide quantity information related to the entity, such as number of employees, number of square feet in a facility, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a quantity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to provide the underlying business function, including payment terms (i.e., net terms, discount, terms, discount percent and discount periods) provided by a vendor(s) to the entity over a period of time.

medi:segment.name: Business function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, A segment to identify the specific business function, e.g., discount.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, A segment to provide the type of payment terms.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide the dates related to the payment terms.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to identify the discount percent range or discount period range, or both, usually expressed in days.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to specify the percent of a specific payment to total payments.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to provide information about the assets of a company and their ownership. This may include, but is not limited to, securities, inventory, and facilities.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment to specify a processing indicator.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment to identify a type of asset.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to identify characteristics related to the asset.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to identify the percentage of the asset as specified in the processing indicator.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to identify the number of units of the asset.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify references associated with an asset.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to provide information related to the monetary value of the assets.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide a monetary amount related to the asset(s).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment to identify one or more incremental relationships associated with a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to identify a relationship and its attributes. This may be used to specify the type of financial relationship between the entity and a financial institution.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to identify the type of relationship of the entity with a financial institution, such as a checking account or an outstanding loan.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to identify attributes of the relationship, such as the type of loan.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments to provide status information and related attributes. The segment group may be used for information related to status or process codes on a specific public record filing.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment to provide a status of an associated attribute.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment specifying the attribute.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: DTM-IFD-PCD-COM-QTY-FTX-SG17 A group of segments providing information about companies or individuals, pertinent dates, percentages and quantities of information details related to the entity.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify a company or individual related to the entity. Some examples of names are the property owner, name associated with a business (such as business name change) or name associated with a legal filing.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to identify the relationships among entities.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide address information for a named company or individual.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment that provides financial institution account details of the party identified in the preceding segment identifying the entity name.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment to provide attribute information for a named individual, such as a business or professional title, ethnicity code, etc.

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, A segment to specify the gender or marital status of a named individual.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment to identify employment details related to a named individual.

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment to specify the nationality of a named individual.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide reference numbers related to a company or individual, such as a social security number.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment to specify the language of an individual either for oral or written communication.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify related dates.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment to provide information details.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to provide percent information for details related to a company or individual.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to provide a communications contact for a named company or individual.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to provide quantity information related to a company or individual.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide any associated text data.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments to provide monetary values and other information related to the named parties.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide a monetary amount related to the subject area.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment to identify one or more incremental relationships associated with a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to provide information related to legal filings. Included is type of public filing, related dates, related information details and associated historical events.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, A segment to identify the type of legal event or a public filing.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide relevant dates, such as date of filing or date of resolution.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment to provide detailed information about the legal event. It may include bankruptcy or reasons for law suits codes. Historical information related to a public filing or legal event may be included.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide any textual information related to the legal event or for non-coded information such as contingency statements from the court.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments to provide location information related to the entity as well as addresses, dates, names and communication contacts associated with the location.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the type and/or function of a location, such as an industrial or central business area.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to identify the relationship between the data related t the location and the other information attributed to the entity.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to provide the address of the entity at this location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to provide related date information, such as the date the entity located there.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to provide the communication contact of the entity at this location.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment to provide detailed information about the entity at this location, such as type of construction of a building or fire protection capabilities.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide textual information related to the location when the data is not codified.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments to identify the entity and parties associated with the entity at the location.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify the name of an entity related to this location, such as a building manager or owner.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment to identify the relationship between the entity and the location, e.g., the spouse of the corporate officer for the entity at this location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to provide monetary information related to the entity location.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to provide monetary information related to the location, such as insurance coverage or value of goods produced at the location.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment to identify one or more incremental relationships associated with a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information related to a monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to provide class of trade information and associated percentages specific to a location.

medi:segment.name: Additional price information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: APR, A segment to provide the class of trade of an entity.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the territory such as a region of a country or a country for the stated class of trade.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to specify the percent of the total volume of business in a class of trade. If a specific location is identified, the percent is that of the class of trade in the stated location.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide text information on class of trade when the information is not codified.
